inclusion.criterion: collected during the screening process will be destroyed.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Potential subjects interested in participation will be scheduled for a screening visit.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Each subject will undergo a minimum of 3 visits all of which will be performed in the Family Planning Research Office at Magee-Womens Hospital.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She will also receive a minimum of 3 follow-up telephone calls.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: SCREENING AND ENROLLMENT: Visit length 1 ½ hours.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: After obtaining consent for a screening ultrasound evaluation, a transvaginal and a transabdominal ultrasound examination will be performed to ascertain gestational age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The transvaginal ultrasound results will be used to confirm gestational age and document an intrauterine gestation for the study protocol.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Vaginal ultrasound to confirm estimated gestational age (EGA) will use the following criteria: EGA (days) = mean sac diameter + 3025
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent will be obtained at the screening visit prior to any research activities.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A medical history and initial laboratory tests (hemoglobin and blood type) will be obtained.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If the pelvic examination is normal, the endovaginal ultrasound confirms that the gestational age will be less than 63 days on the day of the mifepristone administration, and the laboratory tests satisfy the entry criteria, the subject will be asked to participate in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A HIPAA compliant 'Release of Medical Records' form will be signed to allow future access to medical records related to any care provided during the study by another health care provider.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: VISIT 1: The subject will return prior to reaching 64 days gestation. This day will be considered Study Day 1. Visit length 30 minutes.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: treatment of an early pregnancy failure
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: contraindication to mifepristone (known allergy to mifepristone, chronic corticosteroid administration, adrenal disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: contraindication to misoprostol (glaucoma, mitral stenosis, sickle cell anemia, poorly controlled seizure disorder, or known allergy to prostaglandin)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: known clotting defect or receiving anticoagulants
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease. She has an irregular menstrual cycle and does not smoke or take any medications.
